Comment: I won't vote for Kamala in a primary. She's too conservative for me.  America needs an FDR type Democratic party. There's a reason he won 4 elections.     America is falling behind the world in secondary or higher education, not just college, but in trades as well. Shortages in these areas are getting worse, in fact, it will soon become a crisis. Republican’s anti-immigration laws are decreasing the availability of qualified professionals and workers even more. Those most effected are “unskilled labor,” Republicans are also targeting physicians and STEM workers. As a result, immigrants are turning away from America at a rapid pace and they may never feel safe to return and lay roots in a country that could turn on them from one election to the next. Immigrants are leaving their country for stability, so why would they want to come to America where they can be sent to a random concentration camp in yet another country? But does America really need to search for immigrants to fill higher skilled jobs when it has so much untapped talent and potential right here at home?
